entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
